mapper.select: SELECT MAJOR_ID as id, NAME as name, MAJOR_CODE as code from T_MAJOR M WHERE M.PARENT_ID IS NULL AND M.STATUS=1 ORDER BY M.MAJOR_CODE
SELECT MAJOR_ID as id, NAME as name, MAJOR_CODE as code from T_MAJOR M WHERE M.PARENT_ID = #{parentId} AND M.STATUS=1 ORDER BY M.MAJOR_CODE
SELECT MAJOR_ID as id, NAME as name, MAJOR_CODE as code from T_MAJOR M WHERE M.PARENT_ID = #{parentId} ORDER BY M.MAJOR_CODE

SELECT m.major_id AS id, m.name AS name, m.major_code AS code FROM t_cert_type_link_extend ctle LEFT JOIN t_major m ON ctle.target_id=m.major_id WHERE ctle.link_id=(SELECT c.ctl_id FROM t_cert_type_link c WHERE c.ct_id = #{certTypeId} AND c.edu_level_id = #{eduLevelId}) AND ctle.target_type=0 ORDER BY m.major_code

SELECT m.major_id AS id, m.name AS name, m.major_code AS code FROM t_cert_type_link_extend ctle LEFT JOIN t_major m ON ctle.target_id=m.major_id WHERE m.name LIKE #{pattern} AND ctle.link_id=(SELECT c.ctl_id FROM t_cert_type_link c WHERE c.ct_id = #{certTypeId} AND c.edu_level_id = #{eduLevelId}) AND ctle.target_type=0 ORDER BY m.major_code

SELECT M.MAJOR_ID as id, M.NAME as name, M.MAJOR_CODE as code FROM T_MAJOR M WHERE M.PARENT_ID = #{parentId} AND (M.PROVINCE IS NULL OR M.PROVINCE = #{provinceId}) AND M.STATUS = 1 ORDER BY M.MAJOR_CODE
SELECT m.major_id as id, m.name as name, p.name as parentName FROM t_major m INNER JOIN t_major p ON m.parent_id = p.major_id WHERE m.name LIKE #{pattern} AND m.status = 1 ORDER BY m.major_code ASC
SELECT m.major_id AS id, m.name AS name FROM t_major m WHERE (m.province IS NULL OR m.province = #{provinceId}) AND m.status = 1 AND m.parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY m.major_code
SELECT m.major_id AS id, m.name AS name FROM t_major m WHERE (m.province IS NULL OR m.province = #{provinceId}) AND m.status = 1 AND m.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY m.major_code

SELECT m.major_id AS id, m.name AS name, p.name AS parentName FROM t_major m INNER JOIN t_major p ON m.parent_id = p.major_id WHERE m.name LIKE #{pattern} AND (m.province IS NULL OR m.province = #{provinceId}) AND m.status = 1 ORDER BY m.major_code ASC
